data.title: Are Laura Dern And Courteney Cox Related
data.meta_description:

While Courtney is practically associated with Monica Geller from the NBC comedy Friends, Laura is best known for playing Dr. Ellie Sattler in the Jurassic Park series.

data.text:
Are Laura Dern And Courteney Cox Related | Family And Net Worth

Two well-known Hollywood actors are Courtney Cox and Laura Dern. Fans want to know if the two are linked after frequently observing them together.

While Courtney is practically associated with Monica Geller from the NBC comedy Friends, Laura is best known for playing Dr. Ellie Sattler in the Jurassic Park series.

Courteney Cox has a much larger net worth than Laura

According to Celebrity Net Worth, Courtney Cox is worth $150 million, while Laura Dern is worth $20 million. Courtney, therefore, has $120 million more in assets than her best friend Laura.

With her roles in the movies Mask, Blue Velvet, Wild at Heart, Marriage Story, and Jurassic Park, Laura became well-known. For her performance in Marriage Story, she won the Oscar, the greatest honor in cinema.

Contrarily, Courteney also works as a producer and director in addition to being an actor. Scream, Family Ties, and Cougar Town are among of her most-known films in addition to Friends. She has won accolades including the Criticsâ Choice and Golden Globe awards.

Even 18 years after the end of the program, each member of the Friends cast, including Courteney, is said to collect $10â20 million in royalties.

Courteney Cox and Laura Dern They Are Good Friends, Related

Although they are not related, Courtney Cox and Laura Dern have been close friends for many years. They have a yearly habit of spending Christmas Eve together because the famous couple is so close.

Additionally, discover whether Shailene Woodley and Ansel Elgort are related. Relationship between Family and Net Worth.

They celebrated New Yearâs Eve for the 14th consecutive year in 2019. With their kids, the actresses headed out for breakfast. They were joined by Lauraâs son Ellery, Jaya, and Courteneyâs daughter Coco.

Other times, all we see from them is love and adoration for one another.

Laura is considered by Courtney to be her mentor, she previously claimed. She thinks the other actress is extraordinarily gifted, has strong convictions, and is willing to battle for those convictions.

Laura frequently refers to Courtney as her best friend and gushes about their bond.

The two are periodically seen on each otherâs social media accounts. Together, they produce skits and other stuff.

Family tree of Courteney Cox

Birmingham, Alabama is where Courteney Bass Cox was born and reared in the US. Richard Lewis Cox and Courteney Copeland are her parents.

When she was ten years old, her parents divorced, and her mother later wed businessman Hunter Copeland. Samuel and Dot Bass are Courteneyâs maternal grandparents.

Virginia, Dorothy, and Richard Jr. are her three elder siblings; Cox is the youngest. Courteney has ancestors from England.

In 1999, Courteney married actor David Arquette, with whom she later had a daughter. She goes by the name Coco and is currently 18 years old. Coco has Jennifer Aniston as her godmother.

Courtney started dating Johnny McDaid, a member of the band Snow Patrol, following her divorce from David. Since then, the pair has been a unit.

Laura Dernâs Family Information

US native Laura Elizabeth Dern is from Los Angeles, California. Actors Diane Ladd and Bruce Dern are her parents.

When she was two years old, her parents divorced, and she was raised by her mother and maternal grandmother, Mary.

Her great-grandfather was former Utah governor and Secretary of War George Dern, and her godmother was actress Shelley Winters. Laura is of Oslo-born Norwegian descent.

In 2005, Laura wed the musician Ben Harper. Together, the couple is the parent of two kids: Jaya and Ellery Walker, a son.

Lauraâs first marriage to Harper resulted in the birth of Charles and Harris, who now have Laura as their stepmother. She is friendly with them. 2013 saw the finalization of Laura and Benâs divorce.
